data.title: Mayor's Office
data.text:
Larry Waters

Sevier County Mayor

Phone: 865.453.6136

Email: mayor@seviercountytn.gov

Larry Waters was born and raised in Sevier County. He graduated from Sevier County High School. He attended the University of Tennessee and got a B.S. Degree in Business Administration in 1974. Larry then became a principal in the Sevier County school system until 1978, when he was elected to Sevier County Executive. In 1984 he completed the Tennessee County Officials Certificate Program and continued to serve Sevier County as executive until 2003, when that title was changed to county mayor.

Larry and his wife Terri make their home in Gatlinburg, where they attend the First Baptist Church of Gatlinburg. They have two children, David, and Adrienne, married to Bart Ogle. They are the proud grandparents of Caden and Camilla Waters and Charlotte and Amelia Ogle.

Memberships and Offices

Past Chairman and current Board Member - United Way Campaign

Member - Leadership Sevier and Leadership Knoxville

Past President - Tennessee County Services Association

Past and Present Chairman- Tennessee Development District Association

Past Chairman and current Executive Committee Member - East Tennessee Development District

Past Chairman and current Executive Committee Member - East Tennessee Human Resources Agency

Past Chairman and current Member of the Board, Carson Newman Board of Trustees

Current Board Member - Tennessee County Mayor Association

Past Chairman and Executive - UT Chancellor's Associates

Vice Chairman and current Board Member - Tennessee Air Pollution Control Board

Former Chairman, current Member, and Deacon - First Baptist Church of Gatlinburg

Past Executive Committee Member - Sevier County Republican Party

Current Member – Tennessee Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations

Past Chairman and current Board Member – East Tennessee Economic Development Agency

Treasurer – Sevier County Economic Development Council

Vice Chair and Executive Board Member – County Executives of America

Vice Chair – NACo Membership Committee

Awards

Special Citation Veterans of Foreign Wars - 1980?

Local Leadership Program - 1991

Pless R. Newman Republican Services Award - 2003

Boy Scouts Sequoyah District Great Smoky Mountain Council Good Scout Award - 2013

Robert M. Wormsley Outstanding County Official of the Year Award – 2010

East Tennessee State University Honorary Alumnus – 2013

University of Tennessee Outstanding Alumnus – 1995-96
